name: Rush Hour (itch) (Hiroki39)
description:
It is a busy Monday morning and you are running late for your math class. This is your last chance and if you are late today, you will get suspended!

Therefore, even though you know it is risky, you decide to run through the traffic and train tracks!

Avoid cars, trains, skateboard, and collect as many clocks as you can. Try your best to reach the classroom within ten minutes!
